dcterms:description: A large-scale audio-visual dataset containing 10-second clips from YouTube videos, used for training and testing models in audio-visual representation learning.
dcterms:title: VGGSound

dcterms:creator: H. Zhao

dcterms:description: A dataset designed for evaluating audio-visual retrieval tasks, particularly in challenging settings with multiple videos featuring similar visual and acoustic features.
dcterms:title: Music
